section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Ibn Buraida narrated it on the authority of his father that a Bedouin came when the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) had completed the morning prayer. He thrust his head in the door of the mosque, and then the hadith (as narrated above) was narrated. This hadith has been reported by another chain of transmitters
